data.name: KSL Live World 2016 ~the Animation Charlotte & Rewrite~
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

The full KSL Live World 2016 ~the Animation Charlotte & Rewrite~ concert experience is now on Steam!


Immerse yourself in the worlds of Charlotte and Rewrite by reliving the full three-hour-plus concert and all 26 featured songs!
Fully subtitled in English and Traditional and Simplified Chinese with karaoke subtitles accompanying each song, this special Steam release of the April 30, 2016 concert is a must-have in any Key fan or anisong lover's library.

This concert video is an English and Chinese subtitled version of the KSL Live World 2016 ~the Animation Charlotte & Rewrite~ Blu-ray release first released on March 29, 2017 (KSLM-0008 / KSLV-0007).

KSL Live World 2016 ~the Animation Charlotte & Rewrite~ Setlist

1. Philosophyz - NanosizeMir

2. A Tiny Beginning (Sasayaka na Hajimari) - NanosizeMir
3. Harvest - Aoi Tada
4. Under This Tree (Kono Ki no Shita de) - Aoi Tada
5. Love Letter (Koibumi) - Aoi Tada/Ayaka Kitazawa
6. Sunbright - Ayaka Kitazawa
7. Feverish Days (Hatsunetsu Days) - Runa Mizutani (NanosizeMir)
8. Till the Eden (Rakuen Made) - Ayaka Kitazawa
9. Trigger (English) - marina
10. Vanishing Day (Japanese) - marina
11. Fallin' (English) - marina
12. Song of Revolving Stars (Hoshi Meguri no Uta) - Lia
13. Light colors - Lia
14. My Soul, Your Beats! - Lia
15. The Ship of Stars (Hoshi no Fune) - Lia
16. Stardust (Hoshikuzu) - Haruka Shimotsuki
17. To the Eternal Planet (Towa no Hoshi e) - Haruka Shimotsuki
18. Rewrite - PSYCHIC LOVER
19. Your Letters (Kimi no Moji) - Anri Kumaki
20. End of the World - Anri Kumaki
21. CANOE - Aoi Tada

Encore
22. Crow Song - marina
23. To the Other Side of Darkness (Yami no Kanata e) - NanosizeMir
24. Unblazing Wings (Yakeochinai Tsubasa) - Aoi Tada
25. Bravely You - Lia
26. Traveler (Tabibito) - All members

data.short_description: Immerse yourself in the worlds of Charlotte and Rewrite by reliving the full three-hour-plus KSL Live World 2016 concert! Fully subtitled in English and Chinese with karaoke subtitles, this special Steam release is a must-have in any Key fan's library.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
